title: League is garbage now
body:
This game is shit now, srsly. First they changed my favorite adc into a jungler {{champion:104}} .  Then they added some shitty dragon buffs, and made all tanks overpowered as fuck "full armor malphite one shots adc's". Now you decided to nerf Yasuo because kids are crying that he's "overpowored, no skill champ". Yeah, nerfing his fking shitty early game to literally unplayable early game is a good idea to ruin my favorite champ again, thanks! 
Then my main account gets stolen and permabanned for being toxic or some shit and they wont unban it. "Im toxic now couse of that reason :)".
And you even added an autofill system because people don't play support, and some of them just troll instead of going support or do rly bad because support is a boring role, and it was never fun and never will be, i don't care what you support mains say about it, you just play it couse you can't play other roles. I bet most people just play this game to waste some time. From season 1 to 5 the game kept going in the right place, but after that it just became garbage.

The main issue with this game is that damage is too high all around. Everyone hits like they were designed for burst. Check out stuff from 2014 and you'll see a huge difference in how fights played out.
If your account was truly stolen and then perma'd, player support would have given it back to you once they verified it was you like they do for everyone else fyi.
I was in other country when my account was banned, they just said : we aren't giving you ur account back, ur toxic.

They can confirm if it's you or not.
If that happened, then while they were checking for the compromise they would have compared the chat "before" and "after" the compromise and found you were toxic so manual review would have banned you.

Do you honestly think they will make effort on confirming if that was me or not? xddDDDXDXdx
I sent a lot of messages to them every time they said no, not checking shit lmao xdddddd
I had received 1 or 2 chat restricts on that account just because of tilt, and i wasn't even flaming them hard, just called them bad and smthing like that.

The last message i got - https://gyazo.com/e637ea0a0b3f2199d9fbd10ee5242833 

The guy who stole it even goten a 2 week ban lmao xd

That's fine if you don't believe it, the point is that even if they confirmed it _was compromised_ they would do a manual review on the case due to the chat logs you had _before_.  If they deemed them toxic, then you'd be banned manually.  You're confusing _why_ you got banned.

>The guy who stole it even goten a 2 week ban lmao xd

On your account or his?  If it's the first one ofc. that's the next step after the chat restricts you earned, and after 14-day is a perma.  If it's the second one Riot support wouldn't tell you if he got given a 2-week ban on his acc.  You'd only know that if you knew him irl.

> i don't care what you support mains say about it, you just play it couse you can't play other roles

Nah, I play support because I cant stand to wait 10 minutes to play a shitty game like League. So I play support and I only have to wait 40 seconds to play a shitty game like League. But you are right, support is crap, mostly unfun, mostly unrewarding and I only play this shitty game to waste some time.

> From season 1 to 5 the game kept going in the right place, but after that it just became garbage.

Guess who riot hired in seasson 5. You didnt need to have superpowers in order to know what was going to happen to this game once they hired him, tbh.


I dont agree with the reasons you give to say that LoL is garbage now, but I do agree with the fact that LoL is garbage now.
